content: U.S. industrial automation equipment company Emerson Electric Co raised its cash-and-stock offer to acquire Rockwell Automation Inc to $29 billion on Thursday  ratcheting up pressure on its smaller peer to engage in deal talks.
name: Rockwell Automation Inc
title: Emerson sweetens bid for Rockwell Automation to $29 billion

content: * Rockwell shares up 7 pct  Emerson down 2 pct premarket (Adds Rockwell's statement  analysts' comments  BreakingViews link  and updates shares)

content: Nov 16 Emerson Electric Co boosted its takeover offer for Rockwell Automation Inc to about $29 billion  after a previous offer of $27.6 billion was rebuffed last month.
name: Rockwell Automation Inc
title: Emerson sweetens bid for Rockwell Automation to $29 bln

content: MUNICH  Nov 9 Siemens is not interested in taking part in large industrial automation merger deals at the moment  its chief executive said when asked about consolidation in the context of Emerson Electric's attempt to buy Rockwell Automation.

content: Nov 8 U.S. factory automation equipment maker Rockwell Automation Inc said on Wednesday it would stick to its current strategic plan  after rebuffing a more than $27 billion takeover bid from larger rival Emerson Electric Co's in October.

title: Rockwell Automation to focus on operations after rejecting Emerson bid
